thread.title: Tennis: Nadal routs Wawrinka 6-2, 6-1 to reach Shanghai semifinals - Omni Sports - Sports
thread.title_full: Tennis: Nadal routs Wawrinka 6-2, 6-1 to reach Shanghai semifinals - Omni Sports - Sports - Ahram Online

author: english.ahram.org.eg
title: Tennis: Nadal routs Wawrinka 6-2, 6-1 to reach Shanghai semifinals - Omni Sports - Sports
text:
Related Tennis: Nadal says getting to grips with 'mental injury' Tennis: Djokovic humbles Nadal to extend Beijing dynasty Rafael Nadal beat a top-five player for the first time in more than a year by defeating Stan Wawrinka 6-2, 6-1 Friday to reach the semifinals of the Shanghai Masters.
The fourth-seeded Wawrinka missed wildly on his groundstrokes throughout the match, finishing with 34 unforced errors. He was coming off a tough three-set victory over Marin Cilic in the quarterfinals that finished close to midnight the night before.
Nadal hadn't won against a top-five player since last year's French Open final when he defeated No. 2 Novak Djokovic for his 14th Grand Slam title.
Nadal will play Jo-Wilfried Tsonga in the semifinals on Saturday after the French player topped Kevin Anderson of South Africa 7-6 (6), 5-7, 6-4.
(For more sports news and updates, follow Ahram Online Sports on Twitter at @AO_Sports and on Facebook at AhramOnlineSports .)
